name: Bewildering Broadleaf
description: An arrow-shaped leaf dropped by the monster known as the Tenebrous Mimifloraafter being vanquished.  After corroding the Ley Lines and extracting the memories within, the creaturegrows these leaves as a means of storing the information it has deciphered.There may be a close link between these intricately patterned leaves and theforms that their host can mimic.
